name: Butterfly_Swarm_V6_Hyperfly_edition
author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones with emissive cyan wing materials across a configurable 3D area. Animates wing flapping and sinusoidal drift movement per-frame on the client. Configurable scale, flap speed, fly speed, spawn height, and area size via UI panel.
